verses.name: Ezra 10:18
verses.text: And among the sons of the priests there were found that had taken strange wives: namely, of the sons of Jeshua the son of Jozadak, and his brethren; Maaseiah, and Eliezer, and Jarib, and Gedaliah.

verses.name: Ezra 10:19
verses.text: And they gave their hands that they would put away their wives; and being guilty, they offered a ram of the flock for their trespass.

verses.name: Ezra 10:20
verses.text: And of the sons of Immer; Hanani, and Zebadiah.

verses.name: Ezra 10:21
verses.text: And of the sons of Harim; Maaseiah, and Elijah, and Shemaiah, and Jehiel, and Uzziah.

verses.name: Ezra 10:22
verses.text: And of the sons of Pashur; Elioenai, Maaseiah, Ishmael, Nethaneel, Jozabad, and Elasah.
